item.name: HR Management - Employees
item.description: APIs for managing employee records, including creation, updates, promotions, and leave credit management.

query.description: Filter by status (Active, Inactive, On Leave, Retired, Resigned).
Filter by employment status (Permanent, Temporary, etc.).
Search by name or employee number.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all employees with optional filtering.
Create a new employee record with optional initial service record.
Search employees by name.
Retrieve overall employee statistics including counts by status and position.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific employee.
Update an existing employee's information.
Soft delete an employee record.
Promote an employee to a new position with updated salary grade.

item.name: HR Management - Leave Requests
item.description: APIs for managing employee leave requests with approval workflow.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of leave requests with optional filtering.
Create a new leave request with automatic leave credit validation.
Retrieve all pending leave requests requiring action.
Get leave statistics for a specific employee.
Immediate supervisor recommends approval of leave request.
Final approval of leave request with automatic leave credit deduction.
Reject a leave request with reason.
Cancel a leave request with automatic leave credit restoration if already approved.

item.name: HR Management - Service Records
item.description: APIs for managing employee service records (201 files).

request.description: Retrieve all service records for a specific employee.
Add a new service record for an employee.
